title: Russia Agrees to Trump Request to Refrain From Strikes on Kiev Until Feb 1
description: Moscow agreed to US President Donald Trump’s request to refrain from strikes on Ukraine until February 1 to create favorable conditions for negotiations, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said., Sputnik International is a global news media keeping you updated on all the latest world news 24/7. Russia Meets Trump's Request to Halt Strikes on Kiev Until Feb 1

Russia Meets Trump's Request to Halt Strikes on Kiev Until Feb 1

Sputnik International

Moscow agreed to US President Donald Trump’s request to refrain from strikes on Ukraine until February 1 to create favorable conditions for negotiations, Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said.
